text: The patch creates a new file in histore/archive/manager/ to organize database-related code.
The patch implements the rename method in the database manager class in histore/archive/manager/db.py that updates the archive name in the database and validates that the new name is unique.
The patch implements the create method in the database manager class in histore/archive/manager/db.py that inserts a new descriptor into the database and validates that the archive name is unique.

The patch implements the get method in the database manager class in histore/archive/manager/db.py that retrieves a descriptor from the database and returns a PersistentArchive object pointing to the archive directory in the filesystem.
The patch exports the new database manager in histore/__init__.py so users can import and use it.
The patch includes formal tests that validate the database manager functionality, such as creating archives, retrieving them, deleting them, and testing edge cases
The patch implements the delete method in the database manager class in histore/archive/manager/db.py that removes both the database record and the archive directory in the filesystem.
The patch initializes the database schema in the database manager class constructor or initialization method, creating the necessary tables to store archive metadata.
The patch includes a summary that explains how to use the database manager, such as examples, usage guides, or implementation notes.
